verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — There [V: were] [ARG1: no celebrity guests , Hollywood entertainers or superstar chefs] . [ARGM-DIS: But] [ARGM-TMP: as she stepped out of the background to host her first state dinner , Melania Trump]

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — There were no celebrity guests , Hollywood entertainers or superstar chefs . But as [ARG1: she] [V: stepped] [ARGM-DIR: out of the background] [ARGM-PRP: to host her first state dinner] , Melania Trump

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — There were no celebrity guests , Hollywood entertainers or superstar chefs . But as [ARG0: she] stepped out of the background to [V: host] [ARG1: her first state dinner] , Melania Trump
